column3: ‚ÄúThe wappa grown from Compassionate ATC in south JerZ is legit.  Very dense, heady, strong and clean all the way through. Consistently a light green bud with frosty tips and orange hairs.  Strongest bud they have THCA is like 26 I think.  Has a clean weed taste.  Not a gimmicky flavor just a nice full bodied herb.‚Äù

‚ÄúI was actually quite blown away by this strain. First off, it smelled like heaven. Very strong scent. I don‚Äôt care to add fruity wine style flavor reviews, so I‚Äôll just say this, tastes like marijuana. very good marijuana.

Second, it was not shining and coated with crystal like you expect from high THC. My guess is the crystal gets roughed up and shaken off at the greenhouse. Or it could be the nature of organic gro...‚Äù
‚ÄúVery good when you really need to stop and relax! This is my pain killer and without this, my nights is living hell with chronic pain. Also good for insomnia.‚Äù

‚ÄúRed eyes! Red eyes, bursts of laughter and uncontrolled movements. For me that was wappa in a nutshell. Brings out the typical and the best attributes of marihuana with its balanced thc and cbd level.‚Äù
‚ÄúWappa is one of my favorite strains. It's sticky and full with trichomes! Smells & tastes like candy! :)‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat strain for back pain this strain grows fast and has fat nuggets for me this strain is a day time smoke smells quite fruity üòÉ‚Äù

‚ÄúBrought this strain to friendsgiving. Had me hungry in time for dinner for sure. The bud is very hairy and frostily covered in trichomes. It has a sweet and fruity aroma. Each bong rip was a blast of fruity flavor. Vaping has more of your typical indica taste piney-ish. Had me sleepy quickly after the eating the turkey. This is a great indica dominant hybrid. definitely brings the happiness and hunger while also givi...‚Äù
‚ÄúRooty, tooty, fresh & fruity with a sofa load of relax! Patients can enjoy an evening with a 'lil extra chill.  Works for my chronic pain so I can sleep.‚Äù
‚ÄúIt's a little sleepy, but a perennial favorite nonetheless less. Good for HIV related stomach issues. Or for laughing & having fun with your friends!‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is the definition of a HYBRID. I like this strain even more than GSC. First off the FLAVOUR..wow what a beautiful sweet smell and taste. Effect wise expect to feel the indica body effects but your mind will still be somewhat cloudy. Expect to sit and giggle at the wall‚Äù
‚ÄúWow! This strain is a powerhouse. Dense light green nugs coated in crystals. Smells like fruitcake. It packs a powerful high that will please even seasoned smokers.‚Äù

‚Äú17% thc .07 cbd. 40% sativa 60% indica. Smells of light lemon,chia tea and deisel. Tastes sweeter the more you smoke. Has an interesting light perfume taste. 
The first 5 minutes feels a little tingly. You get nice visuals. It's kind of like a sober high. I smoked a bowl and I don't feel couch locked, just relaxed and not drowsy. A little spacy and I interested in things. Takes away my anxiety and makes me giggle. Sm...‚Äù

‚ÄúSmoked this for the first time last night.  I got it from Local Amsterdam in Longview, WA.   Let me start out by saying this weed smells very sweet, and somewhat creamy.  I got a lot of flavor off my bong, I grind all my weed and this was super smooth.  Rolled a blunt too, this was sticky weed so rolling up was easy, really smooth smoke.  Total chill mode with this strain.  Slight head high not as much as I would exp...‚Äù
‚ÄúNice strain. Chill couch locked.Slight body vibe. Smooth taste. Overall grade A.‚Äù

‚ÄúFirst review, it was that good. Smoked the flower in a bubbler. You can taste the pine earthy flavor. Amazing. Instant tension in muscles release. Happy, calm but focused high. Heavy body high and potent. Not for first time users. Ceberal high as well but not like a zombie just deep into whatever it is you are doing. Love it for lazy afternoon into evening smoke.‚Äù

‚ÄúHad a lot of fun with this strain. Good body high, definitely left me with the giggles, not too heavy on the hunger or sleep effect . For me that's a good thing. Will keep my eye out for this one again.‚Äù
‚ÄúInteresting. . If you stay away from kitchen, you don't even think about food,  but if you put something to your mouth you just want to eat endless :D‚Äù

‚Äúone of my favorite strains..... not that it has the best taste or high or smell but when you pull 9.9's on all of them. who needs a 10 lol but the buzz is the best by far i have to switch up strains twice a week but with good ol wappa i can make it an every day smoke and still get the effects. enough talking about it im gonna go smoke lol‚Äù

‚ÄúMan Wappa I love how this strain makes me feel because it is definitely a unique high. The grower for the wappa I had is Sonic Green and I think they have my favorite version of this. The THC was 23% and is listed as a hybrid I would say it leans slightly indica. 

The body high feels like it is on my skin in a good way like i'm walking around with a light pulsing force field. I feel confident and low stress when I h...‚Äù

‚ÄúSo far so good!! Smells & tastes awesome, super Krystal'y and beautiful to look at.  Warning: WIll cause extreme relaxation and send you into chill mode hopefully followed by a great snack and a nap!!‚Äù
‚ÄúStrong tasting but a completely mellow high. Won't make you raid your kitchen on a mad quest for food until very late on!‚Äù

‚ÄúWowsers totally GET why they keep the genetics of this SEXY LADY a secret! It has VERY beautiful buds coated in diamonds of trichromes and resin! And she's got an amazing smell fruity Sweet and little hint of skunk! It's got a good 50/50 High to it in small doses. In large doses don't make plans you'll be locked where your sitting for the night!‚Äù
‚ÄúNot my favourite. Pretty energetic but not focused enough to actually do anything, and without any interest in just taking it easy. Anxiety levels are okay.‚Äù

‚ÄúI was at the Vancouver 420, not intending to buy any bud but just enjoying the scene, when I smelled the most heavenly weed stank coming from a large stall. I looked at their menu and saw ‚Äústrawberry ice‚Äù and decided to get an eighth (the price was good) after hooking me up the lady at the counter recommended Wappa. She might think she talked me into it, but I knew as soon as I smelled this one I had to try her. 

Th...‚Äù

‚ÄúSmells so delicious. Okay for pain and anxiety. I love to vape right after a hard workout at the gym. Buds were nicely cured and smoke was smooth. I like to mix with some green crack for a well rounded high.‚Äù
‚ÄúGot a $1 preroll from my dispensary and I am totally in love. Super nice indica high, but giggly, not couch-locked. Definitely going into my regular rotation‚Äù

‚ÄúDecided to change it up...and boy...I wish I didn't.

Got this strain of the OCS website. It was under indica, but clearly it's a 60/40 hybrid and it shows in the smoke.

The bud is typical of hybrids, numerous nugs tightly bound together. A smell is there but isn't pungent.

The smoke is light. And I mean light. 
According to the website their THC level for this product is between 13 - 20%, why my product says appro...‚Äù

‚ÄúOverall a great strain. classic weed taste comes in at 22%. great high good for elimanating pain. This cut was organic grown from reputable company in Canada on a reserve. Like other reveiws no gimmicks jst good sweet smoke.‚Äù

‚ÄúLove Wappa.  It's comfy like a well worn leather recliner...climb in and just enjoy.  No couch lock.  It's life taken to the edge of the astral...not too far out there...just enough to feel like you're on a mini staycay.  Enjoy...just don't buy so much that I can't get mine.  :)‚Äù

‚ÄúA very nice night time strain. It helps with my muscle cramps and insomnia.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is my favorite strain right here baby!!! Yes sir! Wappa was completely life changing for me, and it will be for you too if you give it a chance!!! In terms of managing anxiety and depression I would rate this an A++. It's cool because it's only 60% indica and 40% sativa. Thus, you're getting the best of both worlds without the paranoid feeling that's typically associated with Sativa dominant strains. In addition...‚Äù

‚ÄúThey call me Mellow Yellow...this strain is pretty great. Very mellow but happy and uplifting high. Exactly what you would expect from a hybrid - not sleepy or foggy, a little content too content to be lazy but it has a wonderfully sweet fruity flavors to make up for it :)‚Äù
‚ÄúDidn‚Äôt like it at all. I tried it 3 weekends in a row and got bad headaches and very dry throat every time. Also gave me tachycardia and didn‚Äôt help to sleep.‚Äù

‚ÄúFantastic flower. Very earthy, and fresh smelling. Very frosty with beautiful orange strands all over it. Broke down well, I smoked it in a backwood before bed and was able to finish my laundry and then relax in bed and watch a movie without feeling too slumped, but it did relax me and I had a wonderful nights sleep. Minimal paranoia, a lot of pain relief for my back and stimulated my appetite. Perfect % of Indica to...‚Äù

‚ÄúHmmm. Wappa...I was thinking this one would Wappa me upside the head. Its more of a genital nudge. Nope, its more of a body high. Loose head. Its a Hybrid but indica-dominant, so easy does it. Or sleepyland awaits. Nothing worse than shelling out cash to get your buzz on, only to wake up 4 hours later, with cotton mouth and a head full of nothing. Would be good if you were reluctant on the psychedelics of MJ but want...‚Äù

‚ÄúI've been using a craft grow wappa for insomnia and it is by far my favourite. light and sweet it settles nicely into a tranquil high. the only thing I dislike is that I get a very hacking cough when vaping this strain and a crazy dry mouth about 15 minutes after.‚Äù

‚ÄúLong time smoker recently tried for the first time and it‚Äôs my new favourite night time strain. Perfect for an hour or so before bed as you‚Äôll enjoy whatever you choose to do with the very end of your day (Seinfeld for me) more than usual. After this I drift off into the most uninterrupted sleeps I‚Äôve had in years.‚Äù

‚ÄúA favorite for sleep and relaxation‚Äù
‚ÄúWe love the Wappa purchased from Cannabis Nation Seaside! We're huge fans! As always thanks to Brett the bud tender for his best suggestion yet!‚Äù

‚ÄúWappa is a hybrid that acts like a huge magic symptom eraser. Anxiety? Pain? No problem. 

It doesn't smell bad either. It's scent reminds me of chamomile tea with a mild musky tone that is floral instead of pungent.

Definitely more medical in terms of it's effects. It does a great job of allowing pain to be managed while working on other priorities.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is by FAR the best strain I've found for relieving the arthritis pain in my knee! I love to practice Karate, and I love skiing, and both activities have become challenging due to the pain. A couple hits of Wappa on my vape and the pain disappears! And it leaves me pretty clear-headed too, a very mild high. If you have arthritis, try this one!!‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is my favourite strain.. I love the strong smell and taste‚Äù
‚ÄúRealmente es buena. No tiene nada que envidiar a otras razas. Tiene el efecto tan √≠ndico la primera hora para luego empezar a descender con un efecto sativo que ayuda a no paracer un zombie.‚Äù

‚Äúit is a verry strain, it is not verry strong bus you will get a fun high. its a verry lazy high but i think eceryone will enjoy it. it looks dark green with some brown in it. it will give you a strong appetite and your focus is almost gone.‚Äù

‚ÄúI think wappa is a great strain they carry it Compassionate Sciences 26.12% THCA. i get it every chance i have. I say the taste is fruity but more of a bubble gum flavor. I find it easy to smoke all day as long as I'm busy, if not its nap time for me.‚Äù
‚ÄúOrdered Redcan's Wappa from the OCS and all I could say at first was WAPPA!!!"

column2: it had a very sweet floral scent to it
column3: unlike I've ever experienced. Will definitely buy this again.

column1: Bud looked great and burned even better.‚Äù"

column3: ‚ÄúNice and cuddly. Warm. I wasn't wowed by the flavor though, maybe it was just lost in my vaporizer and I'd get a better taste and aroma from smoke. It isn't bad; it's just really good, not great.‚Äù

‚ÄúA good high that started off in the head and moved in to the body. Didn't make me feel physically sluggish, but did make me feel physically relaxed and somewhat sleepy.

In terms of actually smoking it, the citrus flavour was very noticeable and pleasant.‚Äù

‚ÄúI get a mellow feeling...Mellow but happy and easy to laugh...
I feel like it does help with cancer pain (bone pain) so that's a plus and I fall asleep easily with this, I usually can't fall asleep.‚Äù
‚ÄúWappa from Greenside recreational is to die for!! great taste and omg what a great high!!!‚Äù

‚ÄúOoooh man. .i love this one.  Im a real heavy smoker and this one had me giggling all the way through colbert. Its great. Teeheee.....writing this review is making me titter...if it hits you like it hits me id share a fatty with a few friends and watch something hilarious.‚Äù

‚ÄúWappa is amazing. Such a pleasant shade of green with almost a blue glow at times. Big fluffy nugs with excellent density. Doesn't make me too dumb to function and doesn't over stimulate me. Its my personal favorite of all time.‚Äù

will be buying again in the future :D‚Äù
